Blog.post: the exams ended today ... maths 2 and chinese .. the chinese exam sucked .. didnt know how to do man !! the comprehension ... juz copy all frm the passage ... the essay ... wrote 213 words ... not enough words.. minimum is 250 words... hope i can pass the exam la ... my english oral went well ... tok tok tok too much .. haha ... after this 1st trial then got 2nd trial .. then the PMB .. soo stressing man ... this CHMS ah . soo many test and exams and activities... how to study oh?? i m oredi struggling ... maybe its for our own good ... i guess... but dun need too put too much pressure on the student by making the test harder ... soo sien ..
